adv.js: {}, }} effect={async (form) => { if (!isEditor) { const sid = localStorage.getItem("mlsid"); if (!!sid) { const ses = await db.m_session.findFirst({ where: { session_id: sid }, include: { m_user: { select: { m_role: { select: { name: true } }, }, }, }, }); if (ses) { if (ses.m_user.m_role.name === "ppds") { navigate("/ppds/home"); } if (ses.m_user.m_role.name === "institution") { navigate("/institution/home"); } if (ses.m_user.m_role.name === "staff") { navigate("/staff-pengajar/home"); } } else { form.loading = false; form.render(); } } else { form.loading = false; form.render(); } } }} > {children}
